RetailStoreKpi.name: RetailStoreKpi
RetailStoreKpi.description: Map store groups to assessment indicator definition, products, and in-store location categories and define targets. Targets are the expected compliance values for each assessment indicator definition, which is a parameter based on which markers of compliance are decided for a task.

AssessmentIndDefinitionId.description: ID of the assessment indicator definition to track, such as inventory or facings.

CustomContextId.description: ID of the custom object if the assessment indicator definition is associated for a custom task.

EndDate.description: Final date of the association between a store group and the assessment indicator definitions.

InStoreLocationCategory.description: ID of the in-store location category.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the retail store assessment indicator definition record owner.

PlanogramId.description: ID of the planogram if the assessment task is planogram check.

ProductCategoryId.description: ID of the product category, if the promotion level is for a product category and the assessment task is a promotion check.

ProductId.description: Product for which the assessment indicator definition is tracked.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion if the assessment indicator definition is for a promotion check.

RetailStoreGroupId.description: ID of the retail store group for which the assessment indicator definition is defined.

StartDate.description: Start date of the association between a store group and the assessment indicator definitions.

TargetBooleanValue.description: The expected value among the two possible ones for the measuring parameter.

TargetDateTimeValue.description: The expected date and time for the measuring parameter.

TargetDecimalValue.description: The expected fractional value for the measuring parameter.

TargetIntegerValue.description: The target whole number value for the measuring parameter.

TargetStringValue.description: The expected sequence of characters for the measuring parameter.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit used to measure the assessment indicator definition.
